name: Infernoble Knight Olivier
text: You can send 1 FIRE Warrior monster or 1 Equip Spell from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, its Level becomes 1. If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 Warrior monster you control; equip this card to that target you control. You can only use these effects of "Infernoble Knight Olivier" once per turn. Your opponent cannot target a monster equipped with this card with card effects.
